paragraph: With great power comes great responsibility #spidermanwisdom
Genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist... and occasional superhero.
Snikt! Time to unleash the claws and show these bad guys who's the best at what he does.
I may be a man out of time, but my values and my shield are timeless.
By Odin's beard! It's hammer time. Time to channel the power of the gods and protect the Nine Realms. #GodOfThunder
You won't like me when I'm angry. But sometimes you just have to smash through the obstacles in front of you.
Time to make some chimichangas and break the fourth wall. It's gonna be a wild ride, but someone's gotta do it
We are Venom! With our symbiotic powers, we'll take down anyone who dares to threaten our host.
Remember, true believers, the power of comics and superheroes lies in their ability to inspire us to be heroes in our own lives
By the Eye of Agamotto! It's time to tap into the mystical energies of the universe and protect reality from all threats
It's time to protect our people and our way of life, and show the world the strength and power of the Black Panther. #WakandaForever
I am Groot. I am Groot. I am Groot.#IAmGroot
